author: protolambda
content: Update: Pyrmont is back to 100%! Thanks to eth2 client teams working around the clock

author: protolambda
content: However, we discovered various things that we will want to update in clients. So expect some more volatility in participation rates, as clients roll out their fixes

author: arnetheduck
content: Quick update for Nimbus:  we had a pruning issue on finality when there were many late blocks that would cause the nodes to branch off to their histories  - a fix has been pushed out - we're investigating the eth1 voting issue and should have a fix ready soon as well

author: protolambda
content: Update: we are redeploying some EF nodes and switching back to Teku and Nimbus nodes with newest updates.

author: arnetheduck
content: we're we're also redeploying some infra, expect a few missed blocks as they restart

author: protolambda
content: Update, expect 95% or lower for a little while, moving 5% chunks of validators to new nodes
